title: Charming, Spacious 3 Bed Apartment in the Heart of Riverside! Heat Inc
posting_body: ['48 Lawton Rd - 2 Riverside, IL 60546', 'Available early September!', 'Please email leasing with showing requests and inquiries.', 'Charming, spacious 3 bed in the heart of Riverside!', 'Features:', '- Hardwood floors', '- Great open-plan layout', '- Spacious living room with decorative fireplace', '- Huge bedroom', '- New windows', '- Lots of natural sunlight', '- Ceramic baths', '- Heat and water are included', '- Professionally landscaped courtyard', '- Laundry room on-site with both coin and PayRange app friendly machines', '- Bike storage area available', '- Off-street parking (based on availability)', '- Small pet friendly (cats and dogs up to 40lbs, breed restrictions, $25/month pet fee)', 'Location Highlights:', '- This property is in the heart of historic Riverside, with many attractions, restaurants, and shops at your disposal!', '- Commuting to the city is extremely accessible with the Metra stop right across the street, as well as Harlem Pace Bus just a mile away', '- Riverside museum is walking distance, Brookfield Zoo is a 5 minute drive away, and Harlem Ave with many restaurants is a mile away', '- Grocery stores, such as Riverside Foods, are steps away.', "Costco, Tony's Finer Food, Jewel-Osco, & Tonini Italian Market are nearby", '- Farmers market every Wednesday in downtown Riverside from June-October', '(Images are of exact or very similar unit on site.)', 'Terms:', '$350 Non Refundable Move-in Fee', 'No Security Deposit', 'Heat and water are included!', 'Tenant pays cooking gas and electric', 'General Credit and Income Requirements:', '- 650+ credit score', '- Gross monthly income should be at least 3x the rent', '(There are some exceptions to these requirements, such as being a full time student and having a cosigner)', "Don't wait!", 'This is a high demand unit and will lease fast!', 'Meltzer Real Estate', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
